content.prompt: According to Lewin's motivational conflicts theory, an approach-approach conflict occurs when a person has to

choices.label: overcome inertia in order to make a decision to act
choose an outcome that has both positive and negative aspects
decide whether to offer help when there are other people around who they feel are better suited to help
choose between two outcomes that are both desirable

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
